channel.title: Provides multiple scenarios on Climate Tools
channel.description: Recent content in Provides multiple scenarios on Climate Tools

item.title: Climate Smart Farming Climate Change in Your County
item.description: Developed By: Cornell University_College of Agriculture and Life Sciences Summary: Part of the Climate Smart Farming toolkit, the Climate Change in Your County tool allows users to view historic and projected future temperature and precipitation data within their county and region.

item.title: Coastal Change Hazards Portal
item.description: Developed By: USGS Summary: The USGS Coastal Change Hazards Portal is an easy to use tool that synthesizes geospatial information about extreme storms, shorelines change, and sea level rise and makes it available for viewing and download.

item.title: Future Urban Climates
item.description: Developed By: UMCES Summary: The Future Urban Climates tool is an interactive map showing how climate may change within the next 60 years in 540 cities across the US.
